definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: I dropped my watch while I was playing volleyball.
sentences.chinese: 当我打排球时，把表掉在了地上。

sentences.english: Why don't we play volleyball instead ?
sentences.chinese: 我们为什么不改打排球呢？

sentences.english: There is going to be a volleyball match between America and Russia.
sentences.chinese: 美国和俄罗斯之间将有一场排球比赛。

sentences.english: This was successfully operated upon and she returned to playing volleyball.
sentences.chinese: 在成功举行了切除手术后，病人重新回到了排球场。

sentences.english: Excuse me, are you Mr. Hansen, the manager of the Australian volleyball team?
sentences.chinese: 请问，您是澳大利亚排球队领队汉森先生吗？

sentences.english: But last night, the Australian women's volleyball team lodged an official complaint.
sentences.chinese: 但在昨晚，澳大利亚女子排球队提出了正式的抗议。

sentences.english: I was playing volley-ball this time last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上周日的这个时候我正在打排球。

sentences.english: We won at volley-ball but lost at tennis.
sentences.chinese: 我们排球赢了，但网球输了。

sentences.english: Zhang Ying is good at playing volleyball. So is Tim.
sentences.chinese: 张颖很会打排球，蒂姆也会。

sentences.english: Wendy, this is my coach Hong Tao, a former setter in the national volleyball team.
sentences.chinese: 温迪，这是我的教练洪涛，是原国家排球队的二传。

sentences.english: The International Volleyball Federation (FIVB) was formed in 1946.
sentences.chinese: 国际排球联合会成立于1946年。

sentences.english: China beat Cuba in the women's Olympic volleyball final.
sentences.chinese: 在奥运会女子排球决赛中，中国队击败了古巴队。

sentences.english: Playing volley -ball is our favorite physical activities on weekend.
sentences.chinese: 打排球是我们每个星期天最喜爱的体育活动之一。

sentences.english: There are at most five sets in a volleyball match.
sentences.chinese: 一场排球赛最多有五句局。

definition: women's volleyball/abbr. for 女子排球
football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
